about_the_game:
Sharp gameplay with a chilling mystery on the side. This action-packed adventure will have you on the edge of your seat as you embark on an epic journey across the barren wasteland of a large city in an undisclosed location.

  • Explore and find your way to the source of the desolation.
  • Battle a variety of powerful enemies.
  • Make use of your many special abilities in our tight, action-packed combat system.
  • Rewarding gameplay.
  • Rich story.

Permadeath
Die once and it's over...

Combat
Partake in fast-paced, cinematic, and exciting combat. From three hit combos to clashes you will feel like a force to be reckoned with.

Highly animation-based combat that allows you to choose how you would like to dispatch your foes, either normally destroying them, or by triggering a killing blow and taking them down instantly.


Weapon Durability
Every time you hit an enemy it causes damage to your sword. This damage can be repaired by temporarily retreating, however, if you chose to persist then you may risk breaking your sword, rendering you defenseless.

Fight like your life depends on it, and remember, everything is your enemy.

short_description: We are all familiar with the apocalypse. The end of the world, beginning of a new age. It isn't over for everyone though, some resist. There is a way out, but it won't be easy. Androids were predictable, but it still seemed too sudden. Could someone else be pulling the strings?
